data.text: So this is Japan's course……not bad.
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed: <story>So this is Japan's course……not bad.

data.text:
A country far to the east, "Japan". In that corner of the world, 
the strong foes that I seek――
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed:
<story>A country far to the east, "Japan". In that corner of the world, 
<story>the strong foes that I seek――

data.text: Haaa……haaa……haaa……! Kuu……!!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>Haaa……haaa……haaa……! Kuu……!!

data.text:
……If I had messed up the timing on my attack ever so slightly, 
you would have likely made it to the goal first.
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed:
<story>……If I had messed up the timing on my attack ever so slightly, 
<story>you would have likely made it to the goal first.

data.text:
A margin so paper-thin―― 
Up until now, I have never had a race so exhilarating.
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed:
<story>A margin so paper-thin―― 
<story>Up until now, I have never had a race so exhilarating.

data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>…………

data.text:
The existence of the strong, it makes me elated. 
El Condor Pasa, you are an opponent worthy of the title champion.
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed:
<story>The existence of the strong, it makes me elated. 
<story>El Condor Pasa, you are an opponent worthy of the title champion.

data.text:
……In that case, if you go to Japan, 
then you'll be really thrilled.
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>……In that case, if you go to Japan, 
<story>then you'll be really thrilled.

data.text: Japan……?
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed: <story>Japan……?

data.text:
It's not that I got this strong on my own. Because I had everyone, 
my rivals in Japan, I was able to become strong.
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>It's not that I got this strong on my own. Because I had everyone, 
<story>my rivals in Japan, I was able to become strong.

data.text:
If I'm worthy of the title champion, 
then in Japan there are many Uma Musume that are champions……!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>If I'm worthy of the title champion, 
<story>then in Japan there are many Uma Musume that are champions……!

data.text:
The excitement in my heart at that time, even now I can remember it vividly. 
And with that memory, every fiber of my being roils with excitement.
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed:
<story>The excitement in my heart at that time, even now I can remember it vividly. 
<story>And with that memory, every fiber of my being roils with excitement.

data.text: ……keep me entertained, Uma Musume of Japan.
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed: <story>……keep me entertained, Uma Musume of Japan.

data.text:
This is the day that many fans have been waiting for! Where 
countless Uma Musume that have achieved results from across the 
world gather, the 『Japan Cup』!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>This is the day that many fans have been waiting for! Where 
<story>countless Uma Musume that have achieved results from across the 
<story>world gather, the 『Japan Cup』!

data.text:
This year there are quite a few big names! Including Japan's, 4 
Derby Uma Musume from across the world are here!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>This year there are quite a few big names! Including Japan's, 4 
<story>Derby Uma Musume from across the world are here!

data.text:
Among those, the most attention is given to the one who defeated 
El Condor Pasa at the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』, Montjeu!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Among those, the most attention is given to the one who defeated 
<story>El Condor Pasa at the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』, Montjeu!

data.text:
How will the Uma Musume of Japan stand up against her!? 
And then, the World's Strongest, just who will claim that title!?
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>How will the Uma Musume of Japan stand up against her!? 
<story>And then, the World's Strongest, just who will claim that title!?

data.text: Who would have thought that Grass Wonder would withdraw……
data.name: Sociable Young Man
data.processed: <story>Who would have thought that Grass Wonder would withdraw……

data.text:
It's true that if it was Grass Wonder it would 
have been a good match, however, it'll probably 
still be tough for Japan's Uma Musume.
data.name: Serious-looking Young Man
data.processed:
<story>It's true that if it was Grass Wonder it would 
<story>have been a good match, however, it'll probably 
<story>still be tough for Japan's Uma Musume.

data.text:
They rarely get a chance to experience the fierceness of those overseas―― 
and even Montjeu's there you know?
data.name: Serious-looking Young Man
data.processed:
<story>They rarely get a chance to experience the fierceness of those overseas―― 
<story>and even Montjeu's there you know?

data.text:
Even if that's true, you still want 
Japan's Uma Musume to win, right?
data.name: Sociable Young Man
data.processed:
<story>Even if that's true, you still want 
<story>Japan's Uma Musume to win, right?

data.text: ……I'm praying for them, but reality is reality……
data.name: Serious-looking Young Man
data.processed: <story>……I'm praying for them, but reality is reality……

data.text: Suu～.…… Haa～……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Suu～.…… Haa～……

data.text: As I thought, you're still a little nervous, aren't you?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>As I thought, you're still a little nervous, aren't you?

data.text: Ehehe, rather than a little, I'd say a lot……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Ehehe, rather than a little, I'd say a lot……

data.text:
As one of Japan's Uma Musume, the one with the most expectations 
is Special Week-san after all.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>As one of Japan's Uma Musume, the one with the most expectations 
<story>is Special Week-san after all.

data.text:
However, put another way, acknowledged as the Uma Musume in Japan 
with the most potential. It's something to be proud of.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>However, put another way, acknowledged as the Uma Musume in Japan 
<story>with the most potential. It's something to be proud of.

data.text: Yeah……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah……!

data.text:
Right, right, you've done all that you needed to! You've managed 
to lose all the weight you wanted to! You did it Spe, congrats!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Right, right, you've done all that you needed to! You've managed 
<story>to lose all the weight you wanted to! You did it Spe, congrats!

data.text: W-why do you know my weight!?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>W-why do you know my weight!?

data.text:
And besides, in a little bit, 
a really reassuring ally will arrive!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>And besides, in a little bit, 
<story>a really reassuring ally will arrive!

data.text: Ally……?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Ally……?

data.text: Speak of the devil.
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed: <story>Speak of the devil.

data.text: ……I'm glad, it looks like I made it in time.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>……I'm glad, it looks like I made it in time.

data.text:
……Eh? 
…………Eeeh!?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>……Eh? 
<story>…………Eeeh!?

data.text:
Suzuka-san……!? Eh, why!? 
In America……!? Weren't you in America……!?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Suzuka-san……!? Eh, why!? 
<story>In America……!? Weren't you in America……!?

data.text: Fufuu, I wanted to see Spe-chan's race in person.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Fufuu, I wanted to see Spe-chan's race in person.

data.text: Uwaaaaah～～! It's Suzuka-san! It's her, it's really her～!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Uwaaaaah～～! It's Suzuka-san! It's her, it's really her～!

data.text:
It's been a while since Team <Sirius> 
has had everyone in one place!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>It's been a while since Team <Sirius> 
<story>has had everyone in one place!

data.text:
It's because it's such a big stage, 
if we're going to cheer, it needs to be all of us!
data.name: Bob-cut Uma Musume
data.processed:
<story>It's because it's such a big stage, 
<story>if we're going to cheer, it needs to be all of us!

data.text: Everyone, let's cheer with all we've got!
data.name: Uma Musume with Bangs
data.processed: <story>Everyone, let's cheer with all we've got!

data.text:
Spe-chan, for the race today, famous Uma Musume from all across 
the world are gathered here.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Spe-chan, for the race today, famous Uma Musume from all across 
<story>the world are gathered here.

data.text:
Even with all those others there, just show us Spe-chan running impressively. 
That's everyone on the team's dream.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Even with all those others there, just show us Spe-chan running impressively. 
<story>That's everyone on the team's dream.

data.text: Everyone on the team's dream……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Everyone on the team's dream……

data.text: Show me that dream today too, Spe.
data.name: <username>

choices.text: Go run with all you've got!
Go run with all you've got!

data.processed: <story>Show me that dream today too, Spe.

data.text: Show me that dream today too, Spe.
data.name: <username>

choices.text: Go run with all you've got!
Go run with all you've got!

data.processed: <story>Show me that dream today too, Spe.

data.text: Yeah!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah!

data.text: Heeey～, Spe-cha～n.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>Heeey～, Spe-cha～n.

data.text: Oh, Sei-chan! And everyone!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Oh, Sei-chan! And everyone!

data.text:
We came to cheer you on, Special Week-san. 
It seems like you're not feeling nervous.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>We came to cheer you on, Special Week-san. 
<story>It seems like you're not feeling nervous.

data.text: Well, she isn't King after all.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>Well, she isn't King after all.

data.text: Hold on! I don't really get nervous either!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed: <story>Hold on! I don't really get nervous either!

data.text: Ahaha, thanks for cheering, King-chan and Sei-chan too.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Ahaha, thanks for cheering, King-chan and Sei-chan too.

data.text:
They keep saying Japan's Uma Musume aren't up 
to it but, don't worry about that. If you run 
like normal, you'll definitely get results.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>They keep saying Japan's Uma Musume aren't up 
<story>to it but, don't worry about that. If you run 
<story>like normal, you'll definitely get results.

data.text:
Seiun Sky-san is injured……
and to continue on my own path, I'm not participating, but――
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>Seiun Sky-san is injured……
<story>and to continue on my own path, I'm not participating, but――

data.text: Do your best out there Spe-chan, enough for all of us!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>Do your best out there Spe-chan, enough for all of us!

data.text:
『Satsuki Sho』, 『Japan Derby』, and then the 『Kikka Sho』…… when we 
ran the classic races, run with the same feeling from that time!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>『Satsuki Sho』, 『Japan Derby』, and then the 『Kikka Sho』…… when we 
<story>ran the classic races, run with the same feeling from that time!

data.text: Yeah, I'll run enough for the both of you!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah, I'll run enough for the both of you!

data.text:
I admired Spe-chan's running, and because of that I'm able to run 
with more energy than I ever was before!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>I admired Spe-chan's running, and because of that I'm able to run 
<story>with more energy than I ever was before!

data.text:
That's why today too, that run you showed me at the 『Fall Tenno Sho』, 
do it so I'll want to chase after you even more!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>That's why today too, that run you showed me at the 『Fall Tenno Sho』, 
<story>do it so I'll want to chase after you even more!

data.text:
Special Week-sama's run, has been engraved 
in to my heart this whole time.
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
<story>Special Week-sama's run, has been engraved 
<story>in to my heart this whole time.

data.text:
『Spring Tenno Sho』―― an Uma Musume that can run a race like that, 
one day I'll catch up, and eventually surpass it……
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
<story>『Spring Tenno Sho』―― an Uma Musume that can run a race like that, 
<story>one day I'll catch up, and eventually surpass it……

data.text:
And so, let me once again challenge you. 
After you've won against these world class Uma Musume.
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
<story>And so, let me once again challenge you. 
<story>After you've won against these world class Uma Musume.

data.text:
Yeah! Tsuru-chan and Bright-san too, 
I'll run so that you'll want to compete against me again!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Yeah! Tsuru-chan and Bright-san too, 
<story>I'll run so that you'll want to compete against me again!

data.text: Looks like you've got plenty of spirit, Spe-chan!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>Looks like you've got plenty of spirit, Spe-chan!

data.text: Yes, and she seems much more reliable than usual.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Yes, and she seems much more reliable than usual.

data.text: El-chan, Grass-chan……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>El-chan, Grass-chan……!

data.text: Truthfully, I really want to get revenge for myself, but……
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>Truthfully, I really want to get revenge for myself, but……

data.text: Got it Spe-chan? Don't lose to her!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>Got it Spe-chan? Don't lose to her!

data.text: We believe in Spe-chan's victory.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>We believe in Spe-chan's victory.

data.text: And then, in 『Arima Kinen』 we'll definitely have another match.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>And then, in 『Arima Kinen』 we'll definitely have another match.

data.text: Yeah! I'll definitely go win……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah! I'll definitely go win……!

data.text:
Finally, those participating in the 『Japan Cup』 make their 
appearance on the turf!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Finally, those participating in the 『Japan Cup』 make their 
<story>appearance on the turf!

data.text:
Within Japan, the most popular, it's Special Week! 
This is the form of the "The Supreme Commander of Japan"!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Within Japan, the most popular, it's Special Week! 
<story>This is the form of the "The Supreme Commander of Japan"!

data.text: Do your best～～～～! Spe-chaaaaaaaan!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed: <story>Do your best～～～～! Spe-chaaaaaaaan!

data.text: Spe-saaaan! Fight～～!!
data.name: Uma Musume with Bangs
data.processed: <story>Spe-saaaan! Fight～～!!

data.text: Do your best～～!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Do your best～～!

data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>…………

data.text: What's wrong, McQueen?
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>What's wrong, McQueen?

data.text:
Nothing, when I saw Special Week-san, 
I guess I just remembered something……
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Nothing, when I saw Special Week-san, 
<story>I guess I just remembered something……

data.text:
Rice-san and Ticket-san, Brian-san and Suzuka-san 
too, that awe-inspiring feeling when watching 
your races, I think I feel that right now.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Rice-san and Ticket-san, Brian-san and Suzuka-san 
<story>too, that awe-inspiring feeling when watching 
<story>your races, I think I feel that right now.

data.text:
……it was the same with McQueen, too. That awe-inspiring feeling 
of showing me that you'll definitely take hold of your dream.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>……it was the same with McQueen, too. That awe-inspiring feeling 
<story>of showing me that you'll definitely take hold of your dream.

data.text:
Taking hold of your dream……it seems like that's continued on to 
now. A trainer that thinks most about Uma Musume, and the 
feelings of the Uma Musume responding to that.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Taking hold of your dream……it seems like that's continued on to 
<story>now. A trainer that thinks most about Uma Musume, and the 
<story>feelings of the Uma Musume responding to that.

data.text:
As a member of team <Sirius> running……show us you can take hold 
of that dream, Special Week-san.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>As a member of team <Sirius> running……show us you can take hold 
<story>of that dream, Special Week-san.

data.text: Nice to meet you, Special Week.
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed: <story>Nice to meet you, Special Week.

data.text: ……Eh? Ah, nice to meet you!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>……Eh? Ah, nice to meet you!

data.text: El Condor Pasa……your friend ran a truly unforgettable race.
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed: <story>El Condor Pasa……your friend ran a truly unforgettable race.

data.text:
As much as the victory at the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』, just 
running with her made me overjoyed, and my feelings towards 
Japan's Uma Musume changed.
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed:
<story>As much as the victory at the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』, just 
<story>running with her made me overjoyed, and my feelings towards 
<story>Japan's Uma Musume changed.

data.text:
Once more, I want to run in a race just like that. 
For that reason, now I'm standing here.
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed:
<story>Once more, I want to run in a race just like that. 
<story>For that reason, now I'm standing here.

data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>…………

data.text: For that reason, I hope you'll run in a way to grant my desire……
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed: <story>For that reason, I hope you'll run in a way to grant my desire……

data.text:
……I didn't think that even Montjeu-san 
would have such high expectations for me.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>……I didn't think that even Montjeu-san 
<story>would have such high expectations for me.

data.name: Montjeu
data.processed: <story>……？

data.text:
……Leave it to me, I'll live up to Montjeu-san's expectations and 
show you I can become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume".
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>……Leave it to me, I'll live up to Montjeu-san's expectations and 
<story>show you I can become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume".

data.text: Let's have a good race, Montjeu-san……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Let's have a good race, Montjeu-san……!

data.text: Fufuu……
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed: <story>Fufuu……

data.text: <Let's have a good race, Special Week>
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed: <story><Let's have a good race, Special Week>
